channel.title: Utorrent portforward error when trying to login
channel.description:
So first of all, i tried like 100000 ways to portforward. None worked for me so i tried the utorrent way. Im not sure if it worked yet, but what i know is that when I have utorrent up and running i cannot log into my OWN server. But also, when i have utorrent closed completely, i can log in perfectly.
Here is the error i get when i try to log in:
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/nnjqj5.png[/img]
Can someone please help me with fixing this error?
AND: yes i know this is aintaro's client and everything just actually using this client to learn how to code things and what not so dont think im going to just start a server with his client lmfao.

item.title: Utorrent portforward error when trying to login
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

Utorrent fails & half of the time it doesn’t even portforward depending on your router settings

Hmm… if you want I’ll try and help your portforward through the router

Skype:Oceannomic

Read full topic
